definitions.definition: To shorten by omitting parts or details.
definitions.dating_raw: Attested from around (1350 to 1470) until the late 17 century.

definitions.definition: To speak or write in a brief manner.
definitions.dating_raw: Attested from the late 16 century until the early 17 century.

definitions.definition: To make shorter ; to shorten (in time); to abridge ; to shorten by ending sooner than planned.
To reduce a word or phrase by means of contraction or omission to a shorter recognizable form.
examples: Bovine spongiform encephalopathy is more commonly known by its abbreviated form BSE .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the late 16 century.

definitions.definition: To reduce to lower terms, as a fraction .

main_definition: ( obsolete , transitive ) To shorten by omitting parts or details. [Attested from around (1350 to 1470) until the late 17 century.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , intransitive ) To speak or write in a brief manner. [Attested from the late 16 century until the early 17 century.]
( transitive ) To make shorter ; to shorten (in time); to abridge ; to shorten by ending sooner than planned. [First attested from around (1350 to 1470).]
( transitive ) To reduce a word or phrase by means of contraction or omission to a shorter recognizable form. [First attested in the late 16 century.]
( transitive , mathematics ) To reduce to lower terms, as a fraction .
